Title: I Am Sylar
Plot: Sylar continues his unusual partnership and begins to have an unexpected identity crisis. Hiro and Ando take measures toward bringing down Building 26. Meanwhile, Matt?s new found fatherhood changes his priorities. Elsewhere, Nathan sets a plan in motion to right the wrongs of his government operation.
GuestStars: Lisa Lackey, Ellen Greene, Gabriel Olds, Clint Howard
